effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages.
effect_entries.short_effect: Lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.

flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user attacks the target at full power.
The attack’s recoil harshly reduces the
user’s Sp. Atk stat.

The user attacks the target at full power.
The attack’s recoil harshly reduces the
user’s Sp. Atk stat.

sharply reduces the

flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Allows a full-power attack,
but sharply lowers SP. ATK.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:

that also sharply
reduces the user’s
SP. ATK stat.
